content.question: Use a trapezoidal sum with three subintervals to estimate the average number of people waiting in line during the first 4 hours that tickets were on sale.

frqParts.text: Use a trapezoidal sum with three subintervals to estimate the average number of people waiting in line during the first 4 hours that tickets were on sale.

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
